category-def.name: Descent plugin for Eclipse
category-def.label: Descent
category-def.description: The Descent plugin provides an IDE for writing, launching and debugging code in the D programming language from Digital Mars.

category-def.name: Descent-Metrics
category-def.label: Descent-Metrics
category-def.description: The Descent-Metrics plugin is a plugin for Descent that is a port of the Eclipse-Metrics plugin for JDT.
